notes.text:
This update for cairo fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2019-6462: Fixed a potentially infinite loop (bsc#1122321).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An issue was discovered in cairo 1.16.0. There is an infinite loop in the function _arc_error_normalized in the file cairo-arc.c, related to _arc_max_angle_for_tolerance_normalized.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
